## Tips

- Documentation: "Be Kind to the Future You"
  - Keep a research log/journal (paper or electronic, whatever works for you!)
  - The decision, the rationale, the date
  - Research questions that arise while reading
  - Random noticings, wonderings, etc while doing analysis
- Networking and Collaboration
  - Find friends outside of your program/focus area!
